title: Cobweb Plot — Cobweb
text: Cobweb Plot

title: Cobweb Plot — Cobweb
text: y0 Numeric. Initial condition. func Function. input \(y_{\left( t - 1\right)}\) output \(y_{t}\). tol Small numeric value. Convergence criteria. max_iter Large positive integer. Maximum number iterations.

title: Cobweb Plot — Cobweb
text: Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

title: Cobweb Plot — Cobweb
code: # linear func <- LinearConstructor(alpha = 8.0, beta = 0.8) Cobweb(y0 = 0.01, func = func)   # logistic func <- LogisticConstructor(r = 1.5, K = 10) Cobweb(y0 = 0.01, func = func)

title: Fixed Point — FixedPoint
text: Fixed Point

title: Fixed Point — FixedPoint
text: y0 Numeric. Initial condition. func Function. input \(y_{\left( t - 1\right)}\) output \(y_{t}\). tol Small numeric value. Convergence criteria. max_iter Large positive integer. Maximum number iterations.

what: Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor
title: Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor
text: Simple Linear System Function Constructor

title: Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor
Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor
text: alpha Numeric. Intercept \(\alpha\). beta Numeric. Slope \(\beta\).

title: Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor
text: simple linear system given $$     y_{t} = \alpha + \beta y_{\left( t - 1 \right)}   $$ \(\alpha\) intercept \(\beta\) slope.

title: Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor
text: Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

title: Simple Linear System Function Constructor — LinearConstructor

what: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
title: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
text: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor

title: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
text: r Numeric. Growth rate. K Numeric Carrying capacity.

title: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
text: logistic system given $$     y_{t} = r y_{\left( t - 1 \right)}     \left( 1 - \frac{y_{\left( t - 1 \right)}}{K} \right)   $$ \(r\) growth rate \(K\) carrying capacity.

title: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
text: Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

title: Simple Logistic System Function Constructor — LogisticConstructor
Univariate Time Series — UnivSeries
text: Univariate Time Series

title: Univariate Time Series — UnivSeries
text: y0 Numeric. Initial condition. func Function. input \(y_{\left( t - 1\right)}\) output \(y_{t}\). nt Positive integer. Maximum discrete time points.

title: Univariate Time Series — UnivSeries
text: univariate time series generated using following equation $$     y_{t} = f \left( y_{\left( t - 1 \right)} \right) .   $$

title: Univariate Time Series — UnivSeries
text: Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

title: Univariate Time Series — UnivSeries
code: # linear func <- LinearConstructor(alpha = 8.0, beta = 0.8) y <- UnivSeries(y0 = 0.01, func = func, nt = 100) plot(y)   # logistic func <- LogisticConstructor(r = 1.5, K = 10) y <- UnivSeries(y0 = 0.01, func = func, nt = 100) plot(y)
